trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around July 17th 2013
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsMe, my parents and my neighbors all witnessed. At first I saw just one object coming in from the northeast, I thought it was a plane on fire, then seconds later there was another one. They both seemed to stop, hovered for 45 seconds or so, and flew away going southeast, then seemed to have disappeared. 2-3 minutes later a third one comes, also from the northeast, going the same route the previous 2 went, this time without stopping or hovering. I do have video footage but I don't want to leave it here. If someone from MUFON contacts me, I will send them the footage.
